name: bulk_like_tweets
description: Like multiple tweets in parallel by their URLs. Skips already-liked tweets.

detailSteps.code: const likeBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="like"]'); const unlikeBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="unlike"]'); if (unlikeBtn) return { status: 'already_liked', url: window.location.href }; if (likeBtn) { likeBtn.click(); return { status: 'liked', url: window.location.href }; } return { status: 'not_found', url: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: like_result
detailSteps.label: Like tweet
